===Conjunction===
{{zh-con}}

# [[or]]
#: {{zh-x|A 或者 B|A '''or''' B}}

====Usage notes====
* In Mandarin, {{lang|zh|或者}} is exclusively used in statements, while {{zh-l|還是}} is only used in questions.
* In Cantonese, {{lang|zh|或者}} is exclusively used in statements, while {{zh-l|抑或|jik1 waak6}} or {{zh-l|定係|ding6 hai6}} is only used in questions.
